definition: divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
lit. fish sink, goose alights (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); fig. female beauty captivating even the birds and beasts
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
to have bright eyes and white teeth
